name: 赫克托·唐纳德·刘易斯
name_full: 赫克托·唐纳德·刘易斯 Hector Donald Lewis
introduction: Hector Lewis is a Jamaican Artist/ Actor whose profound love for Arts and Music began in during his early days in his hometown parish of St. Catherine, Jamaica. His mother, the legendary songbird Barbara Jones continues to have a major influence on his approach to music and the performing arts - honing his talent that boasts an electric blend of classic influences and modern sounds. Hector completed his first major role as Carlton Carly Barrett in the upcoming Bob Marley ONE LOVE biopic.
